alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 10:50AM EST until February 27 at 7:36AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. For the Kentucky River...including Whitesburg, Hazard, Jackson, Oneida, Booneville, Heidelberg, Ravenna...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.5 feet, Sang Branch Road is under water at Red Lick Creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM EST Friday the stage was 20.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Friday afternoon to a crest of 22.0 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 22.3 feet on 12/02/2004. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued at 8 PM on Friday, February 25th.
